room_title: Escape room "The Orphanage" by Kryptology Escape Rooms in Pigeon Forge
room_description: One hundred years ago, St. Sebastian's Home for Children was closed after four children died under suspicious circumstances. Now, a developer wants to turn the building into loft apartments. But strange noises, sightings, and other paranormal phenomena are preventing the construction from moving forward. Your team has been called in to investigate the events and the evidence left behind. Can you discover the truth, free the spirits, and escape The Orphanage?
